Experience

Santa Clara, CA
June 2019 - August 2019

Centrify Corporation - Software Development Intern

As a Software Development Intern for Centrify Corporation, a computer security company with products for privileged access management (PAM) and multi-factor authentication (MFA), I fixed bugs, using JIRA issue tracking software and Perforce version control software. Additionally, I wrote unit tests in Go. One of my biggest accomplishments during my time at Centrify was restructuring the codebase to use interfaces and introducing mocks in unit tests to increase code coverage of unit tests.

biggest takeaways: Go, Unit Tests, Mocks, JIRA, Perforce
Socorro, NM
June 2018 - July 2018

The Summer Science Program - Astrophysics Researcher

• Used Celestron-14 telescope to observe an asteroid at Etscorn Observatory • Used Python programming to determine asteroid's orbit through Method of Gauss • Published Asteroid 2002 UX data, Minor Planet Center Supplement: Lum M., Noel A., & Valadez C. 2018, “New Observations of Near-Earth Asteroid 283729 (2002 UX),” M.P.S. 906049

biggest takeaways: Astrophysics, Telescope Techniques, Python, Orbit Determination (Method of Gauss), Method of Laplace, Monte Carlo
Davis, CA
July 2017 - August 2017

California State Summer School for Mathematics & Science (COSMOS) UC Davis - Researcher

• Cluster 1: Quantum Mechanics and Applications to Nanotechnology • Learned to program in C, also learned basics in electronics • Built a scanning tunneling microscope to take images of surfaces at atomic level

biggest takeaways: C, Electronics, Quantum Mechanics, Nanotechnology
San Jose, CA
August 2016 - June 2019

the Epic - Editor-in-Chief

Editor-in-Chief of the Epic, the Lynbrook High School student newspaper: • Oversaw 38 student journalists and 5 sections, online and in print (8 issues / year) • Met multiple deadlines to produce an award-winning newspaper • Crown Award from Columbia Scholastic Press Association (CSPA) (awarded in 2020 for publications released in the 2018-2019 school year) • 1st Award from American Scholastic Press Association (ASPA) (2017, 2018) • 1st Place with Special Merit from ASPA (2019) • 10th in Best of Show at Journalism Education Association (JEA)/National Scholastic Press Association (NSPA) National High School Journalism Convention (2018) • Honorable Mention in Commentary Writing (Individual Award) at JEA/NSPA National High School Journalism Convention (2018) • Wrote and published 20+ articles, created layouts using Adobe Photoshop and InDesign • Editor-in-Chief for the 2018-2019 school year • Opinion Section Editor for the 2017-2018 school year

biggest takeaways: Journalism, Writing, Editing, Layout & Design - Adobe Photoshop & InDesign, Photography, Leadership, Communication, Teamwork

I built this website using HTML, CSS, Sass, and JavaScript.
